results.title: The effect of rapamycin, NVP-BEZ235, aspirin, and metformin on PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling pathway of PIK3CA-related overgrowth spectrum (PROS)
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ also effectively suppressed the growth of both @<m>DISEASE_Simpson_Golabi_Behmel_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537340 @@@PROS@@@ fibroblast lines, which had different frequency of mosaic mutations.

citations.NLM: Suzuki Y, Enokido Y, Yamada K, Inaba M, Kuwata K, Hanada N, Morishita T, Mizuno S, Wakamatsu N. The effect of rapamycin, NVP-BEZ235, aspirin, and metformin on PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling pathway of PIK3CA-related overgrowth spectrum (PROS) Oncotarget. 2017 Jul 11;8(28):45470-45483. PMID: 28525374
citations.BibTeX: @article{28525374, title={The effect of rapamycin, NVP-BEZ235, aspirin, and metformin on PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling pathway of PIK3CA-related overgrowth spectrum (PROS)}, author={Suzuki Y and Enokido Y and Yamada K and Inaba M and Kuwata K and Hanada N and Morishita T and Mizuno S and Wakamatsu N}, journal={Oncotarget}, volume={8}, number={28}, pages={45470-45483}}

results.title: Proinflammatory cytokine induction of 11beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase type 1 (11beta-HSD1) in human adipocytes is mediated by MEK, C/EBPbeta, and NF-kappaB/RelA.
results.text_hl: Treatment of adipocyte fractions or @<m>DISEASE_Simpson_Golabi_Behmel_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537340 @@@SGBS@@@ adipocytes with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@acetylsalicylic acid@@@, which target @GENE_CEBPB @GENE_1051 @@@C/EBPbeta@@@ and @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_4790 @@@NF-kappaB@@@/@GENE_RELA @GENE_5970 @@@RelA@@@ signaling, attenuated the @GENE_IL1A @GENE_3552 @@@IL-1alpha@@@ induction of @GENE_HSD11B1 @GENE_3290;26871 @@@11beta-HSD1@@@ (P<=.002).

citations.NLM: Esteves CL, Kelly V, Breton A, Taylor AI, West CC, Donadeu FX, Péault B, Seckl JR, Chapman KE. Proinflammatory cytokine induction of 11beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase type 1 (11beta-HSD1) in human adipocytes is mediated by MEK, C/EBPbeta, and NF-kappaB/RelA. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2014 Jan;99(1):E160-8. PMID: 24243637
citations.BibTeX: @article{24243637, title={Proinflammatory cytokine induction of 11beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase type 1 (11beta-HSD1) in human adipocytes is mediated by MEK, C/EBPbeta, and NF-kappaB/RelA.}, author={Esteves CL and Kelly V and Breton A and Taylor AI and West CC and Donadeu FX and Péault B and Seckl JR and Chapman KE}, journal={J Clin Endocrinol Metab}, volume={99}, number={1}, pages={E160-8}}

results.title: Metformin Increases Cortisol Regeneration by 11betaHSD1 in Obese Men With and Without Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
results.text_hl: Oral @CHEMICAL_Cortisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003348 @@@cortisone@@@ was given to measure hepatic @GENE_HSD11B1 @GENE_3290 @@@11betaHSD1@@@ activity in the ODM group. The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @GENE_HSD11B1 @GENE_3290 @@@11betaHSD1@@@ was also assessed in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ hepatocytes and @<m>DISEASE_Simpson_Golabi_Behmel_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537340 @@@Simpson-Golabi-Behmel syndrome@@@ adipocytes.

citations.NLM: Anderson AJ, Andrew R, Homer NZ, Jones GC, Smith K, Livingstone DE, Walker BR, Stimson RH. Metformin Increases Cortisol Regeneration by 11betaHSD1 in Obese Men With and Without Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2016 Oct;101(10):3787-3793. PMID: 27459533
